# [Story] ORB-057: Create white-label configuration

## Parent Epic
Parent: #519 (Agency Features)

## Description
Implement white-label configuration allowing custom branding per workspace including custom domains, email templates, and visual customization with logo and colors.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Custom branding configuration with logo upload, color scheme, and typography
- [ ] Custom domain support with SSL certificate provisioning
- [ ] Email template customization with agency branding and custom sender domains
- [ ] Branded login page and client portal with workspace-specific theming
- [ ] PDF report generation with custom branding elements

## Technical Notes
- Use CSS custom properties for runtime theme switching
- Implement domain verification via DNS TXT records before enabling custom domains
- Store brand assets in CDN with workspace-specific paths for fast loading
